meanings.definition: To drink an excessive amount of alcohol.
meanings.sent1: He tends to overdrink at parties and then feels sick the next day.
meanings.sent2: It is important to not overdrink and always drink responsibly.
meanings.sent3: After his friend's wedding, he managed to overdrink and fall asleep in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like an overdrinking fountain of joy.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overdrinking can be severe, so it's best to moderate your alcohol intake.

meanings.definition: To consume more liquid than is healthy or advisable.
meanings.sent1: During the hike, she forgot to bring water and had to overdrink from a stream.
meanings.sent2: It's easy to overdrink when you're thirsty, but it's important to pace yourself.
meanings.sent3: The toddler managed to overdrink his juice box and ended up with a big mess.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river seemed to overdrink from the heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: She had to overdrink the bitter medicine to get better, even though she didn't like the taste.
